item.title: Food tours are available in Hong Kong, Guangzhou, Guilin, and Yangshuo through Eating Adventures
item.description: Source: Eating Adventures website. Eating Adventures has expanded its food tour services to Hong Kong. The company, already established as the leading provider of food tours in Guangzhou, Guilin, and Yangshuo, China, aims to provide travelers with an authentic cultural and culinary experience by guiding them through local neighborhoods. Wai Zhou, owner of Eating Adventures Food Tours, highlights that while Hong Kong has existing food tour operators, most are not run by locals.
